definition.content: network describing the legal space of the topology of a utility

examples.content: The legal space needed to access and to keep in repair a cable or pipeline utility network.

notes.content: A utility network may be attributed with information about its legal, recorded or informal space.
A utility network can also be modelled as a basic administrative unit.

definition.content: 유틸리티에 관한 지세학의 법적 공간을 묘사하는 네트워크

examples.content: The legal space needed to access and to keep in repair a cable or pipeline utility network.

notes.content: A utility network may be attributed with information about its legal, recorded or informal space.
A utility network can also be modelled as a basic administrative unit.

definition.content: сеть, описывающая правовое пространство топологии коммунальных служб

examples.content: Юридическое пространство необходимое для доступа или поддержания в порядке кабельных или трудопроводных коммунальных сетей

notes.content: Коммунальная сеть может быть снабжена информацией о ее легальном, зарегистрированном или неформальном пространстве
коммунальную сеть можно также смоделировать в качестве базовой административной единицы.

definition.content: red que describe el espacio jurídico de la topología de un servicio

examples.content: EJEMPLO El espacio jurídico necesario para acceder y reparar un cable o una red de tuberías

notes.content: Una red de servicios puede contener atributos con información sobre su espacio jurídico, registrado o no formalizado
Una red de servicios también se puede modelar como una unidad básica administrativa

definition.content: gränssatt område som utgör det som hör till ett ledningsnät

examples.content: The legal space needed to access and to keep in repair a cable or pipeline utility network.

notes.content: A utility network may be attributed with information about its legal, recorded or informal space.
A utility network can also be modelled as a basic administrative unit.
